widgets_values: A young man is walking on the beach. And he is singing: "<Transcript1>". Music Video Style, Calm and Steady Camera motion. He wear a black hoodie,  tan brown pants, and a pair of black boost.
Near, low, wherever you hide... My model crashes, out of memory again, Once more you eat the door, And leave me with nothing but pain
Near, low, wherever you hide My model crashes out of memory again Once more you eat the door And leave me with nothing but pain

Use : say "<Transcript1>"

in your text prompt for whatever you want the character to say. 

It will refer to the audio vocals.

Use a tag string in your text prompt for this node to do string replace.

It will put the audio transcript into your text prompt for whatever your character are going to speak, via the audio input file.


For example , I use a tag " <Transcript1> " for this node the do string replace.

You can delcare other string if you like, as long as the String Replace feature works, and it make sense in the text prompt.
For Low VRAM model files,  get it from this Hugging Face Repo: https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/tree/main

For text encoder choose either one way to run with.

üÖõüÖ£üÖß Gemma 3 Model Loader is using the way how ComfyUI_LTXVideo Github mention with Gemma 3 model weights to load. It need a lot more VRAM.

LTXV Audio Text Encoder Loader is native node of ComfyUI. 


Mentioned in previous tutorial, check it out if missed it.

"LTXV Audio Text Encoder Loader" use as native node with text_encoder >>> "gemma_3_12B_it.safetensors"

"üÖõüÖ£üÖß Gemma 3 Model Loader" from ComfyUI-LTXVideo custom node , use "Google/gemma-3-12b-it-qat-q4_0-unquantized" 

üÖõüÖ£üÖß Gemma 3 Model Loader have another features that use Prompt Enhancer node from ComfyUI-LTXVideo custom node.


For üÖõüÖ£üÖß Gemma 3 Model Loader : https://huggingface.co/google/gemma-3-12b-it-qat-q4_0-unquantized
For Low VRAM : https://huggingface.co/unsloth/gemma-3-12b-it-qat-bnb-4bit

For native node Text Encoder : https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/ltx-2/blob/main/split_files/text_encoders/gemma_3_12B_it.safetensors
blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles
